channel.title: R on SIMONA SIMONA
channel.description: Recent content in R on SIMONA SIMONA

item.title: Building a website with Blogdown and R Markdown
item.description: Building a website It is always a good idea to spread the good news when you come across a fantastic resource to help others and also to give credit to those who have invested enormous amount of time and energy developing it. I made this website in RStudio, an open-source integrated development environment for R, using the blogdown package. I am still rusty in html, CSS and JavaScript, which are the languages commonly used to build websites ground-up.
